mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice_board(n_bno, n_title, n_content, userid) values (seq_notice_bno.nextval, #{n_title}, #{n_content}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_notice_board n ,tbl_member m where n.userid = m.userid and n_bno = #{n_bno}

select * from( select rownum rnum, username, n_bno, n_title, n_content, n_regdate from (select * from tbl_notice_board n ,tbl_member m where n.userid = m.userid order by n.n_regdate desc)) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
